answers.author: Xavier Bishop
answers.text:
City of 3K+, 1200 housing units, CE staff of 1, averaging around 15 cases per month. In theory he also handles building inspections and stormwater related issues, though not very efficiently. As currently constructed it's a fulltime position producing part time results.

answers.author: Danielle Goodwin
answers.text:
Michael,
Please let me know if CPM can help you obtain some of this data for you. The current data that we have available is from FY2010 and Mid-Year FY2011. We will have the most current data available in May after the annual data collect is complete. Please send me an email with your needs and I will see what I can do for you.
Thank you
Danielle
dgoodwin@icma.org

author: Michael Comstock
text: What is the staffing size of your city's code enforcement staff? What is the number of cases carried by the staff? What is the population of your City? What is the average number of code cases a year are addressed by a single code officer? Thank you.
title: Staffing Nuisance Code Enforcment Staff
